1.0.0.en: First release of a complete rewrite of HomeyKit

1.0.1.en: Bugfixes and new Virtual Button device

1.0.2.en: Cleanups, fixes, renamed Virtual Button to Flow Starter, more device support

1.1.0.en: Rewritten mapping logic, streamlined settings page

1.2.0.en: Rewrote app settings, bugfixes and additiona device support

1.2.1.en: Fixed issue with positionless window coverings

1.2.3.en: Fixed issue with state-only window coverings

1.2.4.en: Fix more issues with state-only window coverings

1.2.5.en: Hopefully last fix for positionless window coverings
